identity.name: MITTEIE
identity.vision: A calm, explanatory asset management experience. Not a sales pitch, but a tool for peace of mind.

design_principles.core_concept: The Anti-SaaS. No dashboards, no widgets, no 'optimize your life'. Just a calm list of what you own.
design_principles.visual_style: Warm Minimalism. Earthy tones. Soft shadows. Generous whitespace.
anti_patterns: No dark mode (unless strictly necessary for accessibility, but keep it warm grey)
No gradients (unless very subtle and natural)
No 'Call to Action' language (e.g., 'Get Started', 'Sign Up Now')

usage.background: Use for main page backgrounds. A warm, off-white.
usage.foreground: Use for primary text. A deep, warm charcoal.
usage.primary: Use for primary buttons and key actions. A soft, dark brown/grey.
usage.secondary: Use for secondary buttons and cards. A warm sand color.
usage.accent: Use for highlights, success states, and active elements. A muted olive green.

headings.usage: Use for all major headings (H1-H3). This carries the 'calm' vibe.

body.usage: Use for all UI text, lists, and forms.

rules: Use generous whitespace. Don't crowd the interface.
Center content for storytelling (Landing), Left-align for lists (App).
Use 'masonry' or 'bento' layouts for the item list to avoid a boring spreadsheet look.

buttons.style: Pill-shaped or Soft Rounded (rounded-full or rounded-xl)

cards.style: Flat with subtle border or very soft shadow
cards.classes: bg-white border border-border/50 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

navigation.classes: fixed top-6 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 rounded-full px-6 py-3 shadow-sm z-50

images.style: Natural light, warm tones, simple household objects. No people faces (keep it abstract/universal).

hero.alt: White vase with yellow flowers in sunlight
hero.usage: Landing page hero background or main visual.

empty_state.usage: Displayed when the user has no items.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'Playfair Display' from Google Fonts.
2. THEME: Implement the custom color palette in 'tailwind.config.js' immediately. Override the default 'shadcn' colors.
3. LANDING: Build a multi-slide storytelling experience. Use the 'hero' image. Text should be minimal and centered.
4. AUTH: Create simple Login/Signup pages. Use the 'auth' image. No social login clutter (unless secondary).
5. APP: The main view is 'Oversikt'. It should look like a curated collection, not a database. Use the 'cards' component style.
6. EXPORT: Create a print-friendly view. This should be stark white, high contrast, purely functional.
7. LANGUAGE: STRICTLY NORWEGIAN. Use the provided keywords.
8. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met. The text is dark grey (#2C2825), background is off-white (#FDFCF8).
universal_guidelines.code_style: Use functional React components. Keep files small. Use 'shadcn' components but customize the classes via 'cn()'.
